root: ^8-2：Ah, I was so obsessed with your painting that I forgot to check the time.
^8-2：I have to meet up with my brothers now. Take this before I forget...
^Me：(Eh? A pair of glasses, just like 8-2's. There's something engraved on the side: "1/7.")
^Me：I never said that I'm joining you!
^8-2：NO, NO, NO, you're just the reserve, not a member, yet. You've passed the first round of examination. Good luck for the next six!
^Me：(Whatever.) Why do you take the fraternity thing so seriously?
^8-2：I'll scare the shit out of you if I tell you.

^8-2：To make it short, we are working to control displacement. Well, my lectures are really worth the price-I'm not trying to sell them to you, bro, I'd help you for free whenever needed. All for our friendship.
^8-2：Painter, I could see that you're having a hard time.

I_lost: ^Me：It's that obvious? Yes, I lost to displacement. Worse, I don't even remember what I had.
^8-2：*claps* You should earn something back from displacement!
^Me：I'm not that type of opportunist who likes to exploit.
^8-2：That's not right. To own is to exploit? No! I'm talking about creation, about art!
^8-2：You just told me that it's impossible to displace things out of the Void.
^8-2：It's disappointing to hear that coming out of you. Painter, before you paint, the painting didn't exist either.
^8-2：Both being creating existence out of nothingness, how is the art of displacement different?
^Me：Well thanks for the acknowledgement, but I'm not the God's pen. A painting is just a painting.
^8-2：Hey, that's not what I mean. Your paintings aren't just paper with colors on it. It is an <color=magenta>accurate depiction</color> of an object.

^8-2：If you could accurately depict something that has <color=magenta>disappeared</color>, if you could remember it and draw it out just as it is... Then you could <color=magenta>displace it back</color>.

c-0: ^Me：I hear you, but it sounds nothing more than crap.

repeat_description_again: ^8-2：Your paintings aren't just paper with colors on it. It is an <color=magenta>accurate depiction</color> of an object.

^8-2：If you could accurately depict something that has <color=magenta>disappeared</color>, if you could remember it and draw it out just as it is... Then you could <color=magenta>displace it back</color>.
yes_I_understand: ^8-2：Of course, it's all crap if you don't try.
^8-2：Ta-da! This is the next challenge towards your membership in the One in Seven Fraternity. <color=magenta>Displace to make something that had disappeared to reappear out of the Void</color>.
^8-2：Isn't it exciting! Not to mention how beneficial it would be for you.
^Me：(Eightminus Tue is a weird friend of mine. He has more secrets than I dare to guess.)
^Me：(And you never know if he's telling the truth.)
^Me：(At least I've got some cash. But I can't find an art supply store that opens till this late.)
^Me：(My appartment is to the west. To the east, there are places where I could kill time...if I weren't so impoverished.)
^Me：(Back home...there's nothing besides the walls. At least here's a stretch of <color=magenta>beach</color> where I could take a walk.)
^Me：(Let's take a stroll before <color=green>going back home</color>.)
